user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic getaway to the Maldives. Find me a luxury beachfront resort with a private villa. Also, suggest some romantic activities and provide the current exchange rate between USD and MVR.

TaskList.description: Search for luxury beachfront resorts in the Maldives with private villas.
Suggest romantic activities available in the Maldives.
Fetch the current exchange rate between USD and MVR.
